io.sarl.lang.core

Interface SpaceSpecification<S extends Space>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - type of the spaces that may be created by this specification.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EventSpaceSpecification, OpenEventSpaceSpecification, RestrictedAccessEventSpaceSpecification

    public interface SpaceSpecification<S extends Space>
    The Specification of an Interaction Space. The SpaceSpecification defines the rules (including action and perception) for interacting within a given set of Spaces respecting this specification.
    Version:
    $FullVersion$
    Author:
    $Author: srodriguez$, $Author: sgalland$

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      S create(SpaceID id, Object... params)
      Creates a Space that respects this specification.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        S create(SpaceID id,
       Object... params)
        Creates a Space that respects this specification.
        Parameters:
        id - - the SpaceID for the newly created Space
        params - - initialization parameters for the Space
        Returns:
        an instance of Space
